A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This has to be the best Star Wars movie in the franchise imo\,besides The Empire Strikes Back.Finally a original plot without a death star.The story was phenomenal and loved the passion in every scene.I for the life of me cannot understand a certain amount of hate for this film?!Love to see the fresh take\,and see where this franchise will go next.My only regret was Finn not dying\,can't stand the guy who plays him.Not a fan of his desperate attempt in trying to be the cool bad ass\,overactor!That was my only complaint.Loved this film!
